UPDATE: I got it to work with method 2: My video settings have  been set for direct x 11, so I picked the .dll file for direct x 11 to patch. It never worked. When I picked the .dll for direct x 9 it worked.

I opened an account just to leave a comment on this torrent. It works perfectly and even kept my old save game. I used method 2. However, I encountered problems at first. The guy above me gave me an idea, so I performed method 2 for BOTH FC3.dll AND FC3_d3d11.dll. I don't know which one got it to work, but doing it on both got me around the bump. No I am playing the DLC on my old save game. THanks!!
